name: @steroidal (prototype)
description:
An early version of @steroidal, created in less than a week for the AGDG Microgame Jam.

Controls:

  • Mouse: Aim
  • Left click: Shoot towards cursor, buy item
  • Right click: Move towards cursor
  • W, X, C: Use bought abilities
  • Z: Toggle homing shots (if bought)
  • Space: Proceed
  • Backspace: Invert color scheme
  • Escape: Quit
  • F4: Fullscreen
